name: PHOENIX SEMICONDUCTOR CORPORATION
sampleDescriptions: Critical defense industrial base supply chain issues for legacy semiconductors. Advocacy for access to a secure and perpetual source of legacy semiconductor components to enable enhanced military read
Advocacy for support of U.S. developed and manufactured semiconductors, replacing obsolete DoD semiconductors that can no longer be sourced in the U.S. industrial base.
